meaningMnemonic: What do you hit to make a sick <kanji>beat</kanji>? A cool little <vocabulary>hand drum</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you: 

You like to use your <vocabulary>hand drum</vocabulary> when <reading>two du</reading>des <reading>mee</reading>t (つづみ). You drum and tap it and it as they high five and it makes them super uncomfortable which makes you super happy. That's why you love your hand drum so much.
